title: Riot, could I get a quick update on this bug?
body:
The issue with fps drops on macs and mordekaiser with sound breaks are still present.  I understand it takes time to locate and fix the issue though.  Could we get an update or an official statement of the issue like those little in-client exclamation marks that inform us of issues? I've just been using my pc instead but its a desktop so I'm grounded to one area with it.

Thanks :).

replies.body:
Hey Actual Gin! 

We are aware of an issue with FPS drops for Mac users. The team who handles these types of things are actively working to resolve this issue.
I've actually been having FPS dips a lot today. not sure why. hasn't happened like this in a few weeks
Yours may be different, this is largely a Mac related big that dips fps to 1-6 in team fights, even with capable hardware and graphics settings low
I run on "very high" settings - Generally run around 120-140FPS. Today i was running around 50 with dips into the low teens. I also play on a mac.
Ohh I see yeah that sounds like it then.  The annoying part is that while a lot of people are posting this to get it out there, there's many people just spamming these posts with "PC>mac" comments
